text: Be weird. Your strangeness is your magic.
author: Parker Lewis

text: Be a rainbow in someone elseâ€™s cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

text: There is no path to happiness; happiness is the path.
author: Buddha

text: Sanity and happiness are an impossible combination.
author: Mark Twain

text: There is nothing impossible to they who will try.
author: Alexander the Great

text: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
author: Michael Altshuler

text: Life has got all those twists and turns. You've got to hold on tight and off you go.
author: Nicole Kidman

text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

text: You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
author: Edmund Burke
